```{r, include = FALSE}
###Sys block
#Non-verbose warnings
options(warn = -1)

###Library block
library(plot3D)
library(RColorBrewer)
library(jsonlite)

###Fxn block
scatter3D_fancy <- function(x, y, z,..., col, colvar = z){
  if (FALSE){
    'nD visualization with XY 2D mapping'
  }
  
  #Creation of 2D projection
  panelFirst <- function(pmat){
    #Project 3D object in 2D
    XY <- trans3D(x, y, z = rep(min(z), length(z)), pmat = pmat)
    
    #Create scatter plot in 2D
    scatter2D(XY$x, XY$y,
              colvar = colvar,
              colkey = FALSE,
              pch = 20,
              cex = 1,
              col = col,
              alpha = 0.75,
              add = TRUE)
  }
  
  #Create 3D projection
  scatter3D(x, y, z,..., 
            colvar = colvar,
            col = col,
            colkey = list(length = 0.5, 
                          width = 0.5, 
                          cex.clab = 0.75),
            panel.first = panelFirst)
}

pltnD <- function(regPlot, vertPlot, fancyPlot, x, y, z, c, xLab, yLab, zLab, cLab, size3D, pal, theta, phi){
  if (FALSE){
    'nD plotting fxn'
  }
  
  #Visualize
  if (regPlot){
    scatter3D(x, y, z,
              colvar = c,
              colkey = list(length = 0.5,
                            width = 0.5,
                            cex.clab = 0.75),
              clab = cLab,
              xlab = xLab,
              ylab = yLab,
              zlab = zLab,
              bty = 'g',
              pch = 20,
              cex = size3D,
              col = pal,
              type = 'p',
              ticktype = 'detailed',
              theta = theta,
              phi = phi)  
  }
  
  if (vertPlot){
    #Visualize
    scatter3D(x, y, z,
              colvar = c,
              colkey = list(length = 0.5,
                            width = 0.5,
                            cex.clab = 0.75),
              clab = cLab,
              xlab = xLab,
              ylab = yLab,
              zlab = zLab,
              bty = 'g',
              pch = 20,
              cex = size3D,
              col = pal,
              type = 'h',
              ticktype = 'detailed',
              theta = theta,
              phi = phi)  
  }
  
  if (fancyPlot){
    #Visualize
    scatter3D_fancy(x, y, z,
                    colvar = c,
                    clab = cLab,
                    xlab = xLab,
                    ylab = yLab,
                    zlab = zLab,
                    bty = 'g',
                    pch = 20,
                    cex = size3D,
                    col = pal,
                    ticktype = 'detailed',
                    theta = theta,
                    phi = phi)
  }
}

#Global data handler
d <- reactive({
  infile <- input$data

  if (is.null(infile)){
    return(NULL)
  
  } else {
    read.csv(infile$datapath)
  }
})
```

### __Save__

```{r}

#Radio button widget
div(style = 'display: inline-block; width: 98%; text-align: center',
    radioButtons(inputId = 'version',
                 label = 'Select Version',
                 choices = c('Version 1',
                             'Version 2',
                             'Version 3'),
                 inline = TRUE))

#Download button widget
div(style = 'display: inline-block; width: 98%; text-align: center',
    downloadButton(outputId = 'save',
                   label = '',
                   style = 'width: 40%'))

#Download handler
output$save <- downloadHandler(
  file = function(){paste(floor(runif(1, min = 0, max = 10^10)), '.pdf', sep = '')},
  content = function(file){
    data <- d()
    
    pdf(file)
    
    if (input$version == 'Version 1'){
      pltnD(regPlot = TRUE,
            vertPlot = FALSE,
            fancyPlot = FALSE,
            data[,c(input$xVec)],
            data[,c(input$yVec)],
            data[,c(input$zVec)],
            data[,c(input$cVec)],
            input$xLab,
            input$yLab,
            input$zLab,
            input$cLab,
            input$size,
            c(color = colorRampPalette(brewer.pal(10, input$col))(length(data[,c(input$xVec)]))), 
            input$horizontal,
            input$vertical)
    }
    
    if (input$version == 'Version 2'){
      pltnD(regPlot = FALSE,
            vertPlot = TRUE,
            fancyPlot = FALSE,
            data[,c(input$xVec)],
            data[,c(input$yVec)],
            data[,c(input$zVec)],
            data[,c(input$cVec)],
            input$xLab,
            input$yLab,
            input$zLab,
            input$cLab,
            input$size,
            c(color = colorRampPalette(brewer.pal(10, input$col))(length(data[,c(input$xVec)]))), 
            input$horizontal,
            input$vertical)
    }
    
    if (input$version == 'Version 3'){
      pltnD(regPlot = FALSE,
            vertPlot = FALSE,
            fancyPlot = TRUE,
            data[,c(input$xVec)],
            data[,c(input$yVec)],
            data[,c(input$zVec)],
            data[,c(input$cVec)],
            input$xLab,
            input$yLab,
            input$zLab,
            input$cLab,
            input$size,
            c(color = colorRampPalette(brewer.pal(10, input$col))(length(data[,c(input$xVec)]))),  
            input$horizontal,
            input$vertical)
    }
    
    dev.off()
  }
)
```
